question: Which country has been recently given permission by India to use Chandipur test range?
explanation: India and Singapore on November 20,2019 exchanged a Letter of Intent that could pave the way for the city-state to conduct live firing of missiles like the Spyder air defence system at the Integrated Test Range at Chandipur in Odisha. It is perhaps for the first time that India will open Chandipur Integrated Test Range for any foreign country.
